author: joolsmeister
post_text: June 22, 2016 at 10:46 AM#1Hello AllJust wondering if its possible to have an Agenda Running/Agenda Stopped macroHave tried Agenda Off, Agenda On, Agenda Running and Agenda Stopped in the Macro Editor but to no avail.Bit rusty on the old Macro Authoring so any help would be appreciated.RegardsJulian
title: Agenda Running, Agenda Stopped Macro
